name: Hilltop Park
description: Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Picnic Area - Accessible Restroom - Picnic Area - Playground - Restrooms - Skate Park It’s easy to locate Hilltop Park: look for the 70-foot giant sundial. Its cement base creates a stage for the surrounding amphitheater. Hilltop was the City’s first public skateboard park and the skate bowl is still in use. Cement slides and picnic tables available.

address: La Salle & Whitney Young Circle, San Francisco, CA, 94124
